import React, { Component } from "react"; import { Button, Container } from "semantic-ui-react"; import { withTranslation } from "react-i18next"; import i18n from "i18next"; import Footer from "../LandingPage/Footer"; import { NavBar } from "./tremsConditionsNavbar"; import "./style.css"; import { history } from "../../helpers"; import DesktopBreakpoint from "../../components/Responsive_utillities/desktop_breakPoint"; import PhoneBreakpoint from "../../components/Responsive_utillities/phone_breakPoint"; class ProductsPolicy extends Component { componentDidMount() { document.body.dir = i18n.dir(); } handleBackButton() { history.push("/legal/terms"); } render() { const { t } = this.props; const language = localStorage.getItem("i18nextLng"); return (
{language !== "ar" ? (

Prohibited and Restricted Products Policy

1. Introduction and Consent

All sellers using the Mazadat Platform are expected to adhere to the terms of this Prohibited and Restricted Products Policy when listing/offering products/items and/or services for sale on the Mazadat Platform. This Prohibited and Restricted Products Policy is not an extensive list and shall automatically, without the need for further notice, encompass all items/products and services not listed herein and which are, or will at any time in the future become, regulated and/or prohibited by virtue of applicable laws, regulations or government decisions/policies.

“Prohibited Products” are defined as items/products and services which sellers using the Mazadat Platform may not, under any circumstances, upload, offer, list or sell on the Mazadat Platform.

“Restricted Products” are defined as items/products and services which sellers using the Mazadat Platform may only upload, offer, list or sell on the Mazadat Platform after having (a) obtained the requisite authorizations, licenses and/or permits from the competent authorities, public bodies or from any other competent entity, or (b) obtained Mazadat’s prior consent.

This Prohibited and Restricted Products Policy may be updated and amended by Mazadat at any time and at its sole discretion, whereby such updated Prohibited and Restricted Products Policy shall be effective upon being posted by Mazadat on the Mazadat Platform. Your continued use of and access to the Mazadat Platform will constitute your express consent to the terms of the updated/amended Prohibited and Restricted Products Policy.

You understand and agree that you are solely responsible for reviewing this Prohibited and Restricted Products Policy and all other policies linked herein. Mazadat encourages you to check the Mazadat Platform regularly for the announcement of any amendments to our Prohibited and Restricted Products Policy.

By offering, posting and/or selling items/products or services on the Mazadat Platform, you acknowledge, represent, warrant and guarantee that:

- you are solely responsible for ensuring that all items/products and/or services listed/offered by you or uploaded to the Mazadat Platform are compliant with applicable laws and regulations and the terms of this Prohibited and Restricted Products Policy;

- the items/products or services in question are not Prohibited Products;

- you have all requisite licenses, approvals and/or permits required for the purpose of offering and selling any Restricted Products offered by you on the Mazadat Platform; and

- Mazadat, its officers, directors, employees, or agents, are not liable for direct, indirect, incidental, special, consequential or exemplary damages, losses, liabilities, costs, expenses resulting from or arising out of or in connection with your breach of (a) applicable laws, regulations and government decisions/policies; or (b) this Prohibited and Restricted Products Policy.

In this Prohibited and Restricted Products Policy, terms not defined herein shall have the meanings given to them under the User Agreement.

2. Prohibited Products

Sellers using the Mazadat Platform are prohibited, under all circumstances, from listing, offering and selling Prohibited Products which include, but shall not be limited to, the following:

- securities, including shares, bonds, debentures, or any other financial instruments or assets of any description;

- living or dead creatures and/or the whole or any part of any animal which has been kept or preserved by any means whether artificial or natural including rugs, skins, specimens of animals, antlers, horns, hair, feathers, nails, teeth, musk, eggs, nests, other animal products of any description the sale and purchase of which is prevented or restricted in any manner by applicable laws;

- tobacco products including any products that contain tobacco, electronic cigarettes and related products, nicotine inhalers or nasal sprays;

- alcoholic beverages, psychotropic substances, narcotics, intoxicants of any description, medicines/pharmaceutical products, palliative/curative substances;

- prescription drugs, or drugs containing prescription strength medication;

- illegal drugs, drug paraphernalia, and drug-like substances.

- religious items, including books, artifacts, etc. of any description or any other such item which is likely to affect the religious sentiments of any person;

- monuments, including stolen monuments, over 100 years old, antiquities and art treasures as defined in applicable laws pertaining to antiquities and national treasures;

- SIM Cards;

- items/products designed to intentionally block or interfere with licensed or authorized radio communications and items/products that gain access to cable or satellite television without permission;

- items that to your knowledge are fake, false or misleading or that may through normal use harm interest or health of other users of the Mazadat Platform;

- expired items/products;

- non-transferable vouchers;

- chemical substances;

- sexually oriented adult materials/products which includes adult films and video games, sexually explicit anime, comics, books, films, animation, adult magazines, nudist publications, or adult anime that include sexually explicit content, nudity, or sexual stories, or sex toys, or listings containing nudity;

- recordings which are unauthorised recordings of concerts or live performances;

- postage meters and stamps;

- spying devices and surveillance equipment;

- laser pointers;

- all kinds of software piracy;

- currency which is currently in circulation in the Arab Republic of Egypt or any metal pieces or papers similar in appearance to the currency circulated in the Arab Republic of Egypt, or the paper notes authorized for issue legally, if such similarity is likely to confuse the public;

- counterfeit money and equipment designed to create money or counterfeit items or money;

- official government papers, documents, files and forms, whether for the issuance of IDs, passport…etc.

- counterfeit or stolen items/products;

- products/items which may constitute offensive or critical political content or that are contrary to the public interest, order, or morality;

- products/items which may threaten national security and public health;

- active credit, debit, or store credit cards, including prepaid credit cards, non-embossed bank or store credit cards;

- items or information that might enable or encourage illegal activity such information on how to use or make illegal drugs, bombs, or explosives;

- gambling and lottery, including lottery tickets, coin operated slot machines, and slot machines that can be converted to use coins, credit cards, and cash;

- hazardous chemicals and materials, including poisons, explosive precursors, radioactive materials and items that contain or release such substances;

- human body parts or organs;

- personal information/data;

- offensive products/items and listings that promote, perpetuate or glorify hatred, violence, or discrimination, including on the grounds of race, ethnicity, color, religion, disability, gender or sexual orientation or which promote any organization with such views;

- services that are illegal or sexual, or violate the User Agreement;

- police, army and emergency related items such as uniforms, equipment, or accessories;

- items/products that pose a health or safety hazard, items/products that are banned, recalled, or dangerous or do not fulfill the requirements of the Egyptian Organization for Standards and Quality;

- used undergarments;

- all products/items that are harmful, abusive, unlawful, threatening, harassing, blasphemous, defamatory, obscene, pornographic, pedophilic, libelous, invasive of another's privacy or other rights, hateful, or racially, ethnically objectionable, disparaging, relating or encouraging money laundering or illegal gambling or harms or could harm minors in any way or otherwise unlawful in any manner whatsoever; and

- all products which violate public policy and morals.

3. Restricted Products

Sellers using the Mazadat Platform are prohibited from listing, offering and/or selling Restricted Products without having first obtained all licenses, approvals and/or permits required for the purpose of offering and selling the Restricted item/product in question. Sellers may be required by Mazadat to present such licenses, approvals and/or permits. Restricted Products include, but shall not be limited to, the following:

- telecommunication devices;

- electronic equipment;

- wireless devices;

- medical devices and equipment;

- supplements;

- baby food and special food;

- beauty products/cosmetics;

- toys;

- fertilizers;

- pesticides;

- all types of weapons;

- electronic boilers;

- video games and audio or visual media;

- books as well as electronic books;

- copies or reproduction of artwork;

- softwares;

- property listings;

- charity listings;

- chance listings which include mystery items, giveaways, sweepstakes, random drawings, raffles, and contests;

- seeds and plants;

- event tickets;

- food;

- travel services;

- used clothing; and

- recordable media.

4. Violation of this Prohibited and Restricted Products Policy

In the event that you breach the terms of this Prohibited and Restricted Products Policy, Mazadat, without prejudice to the rights and remedies available to Mazadat under the User Agreement or at law, may take such steps as it deems appropriate or necessary including, but not limited to, the following:

- temporarily or indefinitely suspending your account;

- banning you from using or accessing the Mazadat Platform and the Service;

- remove all items/products and/or services which violate the terms of this Prohibited and Restricted Products Policy or applicable laws, regulations and government decisions/policies; and

- take such steps as it deems appropriate or necessary including taking legal action against you.

) : (

سياسات المنتجات الخاصة بمزادات النسخة العربية قيد الانشاء

)}
